name: Two-Can-Do
description:
HI FROM AF'BROS GAMES

WELCOME TO TWO-CAN-DO, our second game and submission to the UNITED GAME JAM 2020! Taking part in our first ever game jam has been a frantic but fun process but we're really excited to share our game.

Two-Can-Do is a simple co-op platformer with a twist. For each level the movement capabilities of each player are limited and different. Therefore the two jelly-like brothers, '1' and '2', must work together to each their goal through completing a series of movement based puzzles.

For example, '1' may be able to move but not jump and '2' may only be able to jump. 

'Movement Blocks' are scattered throughout the levels. Collect these to open up new movement capabilities and help the brothers reach their goal.

Two-Can-Do links to the theme 'Two' by being a game where you control two characters (either solo or in co-op),  and complete puzzles using two different movement types between each player (move and jump).

With only 10 of the 48 hours available we were only able to create ... levels for the game. Despite lacking a wide range of levels we hope you enjoy the game, the idea behind the puzzles and it's fun squishy characters :D

AF'BROS GAMES 

(Note: Despite our name this is a solo submission)

CREDIT:

Used music by jobromedia: https://opengameart.org/content/happy-walk
